remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當沒有任何泛型類型定義或任何封入類型或方法本身的類型引數中的開放式建構的類型時，才可以叫用泛型方法。A generic method can be invoked only if there are no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the method itself or in any enclosing types. 因為類型可能很複雜，讓這種遞迴判定並不容易。Because types can be arbitrarily complex, making this recursive determination is difficult. 為了方便起見，並減少錯誤的機會屬性會提供標準的方式來區別封閉式的建構方法，可以叫用，並開啟建構方法，不能。For convenience, and to reduce the chance of error, the property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed methods, which can be invoked, and open constructed methods, which cannot. 如果屬性會傳回`true`，無法叫用方法。If the property returns `true`, the method cannot be invoked. 以遞迴方式型別參數的屬性搜尋。The property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它會傳回`true`開放式型別中的任何方法`A`(`A(Of T)` Visual Basic 中)，即使不是泛型方法本身。For example, it returns `true` for any method in an open type `A` (`A(Of T)` in Visual Basic), even though the method itself is not generic. 與此相反的行為與屬性，會傳回`false`這類方法。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for such a method. 同樣地， property 參數會傳回`true`開啟型別中任何建構函式，即使建構函式不能有自己的型別參數。Similarly, the property parameter returns `true` for any constructor in an open type, even though constructors cannot have type parameters of their own. 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前執行的方法上泛型類型定義傳回的取自於泛型類型定義 (也就是傳回`true`)。If the currently executing method is defined on a generic type, the that is returned by is obtained from the generic type definition (that is, returns `true`). 因此，它不會反映在呼叫方法時所使用的類型引數。Therefore, it does not reflect the type arguments that were used when the method was called. 比方說，如果方法`M()`泛型類型上定義`C`(`C(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，和呼叫`C.M()`，然後傳回`C.M()`(`C(Of T).M()` Visual Basic 中)。For example, if a method `M()` is defined on a generic type `C` (`C(Of T)` in Visual Basic), and is called from `C.M()`, then returns `C.M()` (`C(Of T).M()` in Visual Basic). 如果目前正在執行的方法是泛型方法，傳回泛型方法定義。If the currently executing method is a generic method, returns the generic method definition. 如果泛型類型上定義的泛型方法取自於泛型類型定義。If the generic method is defined on a generic type, the is obtained from the generic type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會定義兩種類型。The following example defines two types. 第一個是非泛型類別， `TestClass`，包含建構函式，一個名為方法`GetValue`，和名為讀寫屬性`GetValue`。The first is a non-generic class, `TestClass`, includes a constructor, a method named `GetValue`, and a read-write property named `GetValue`. 第二個是名為泛型類別`TestClass`建構函式，包括`GetValue`方法和泛型方法， `ConvertValue`。The second is a generic class named `TestClass` that includes a constructor, a `GetValue` method, and a generic method, `ConvertValue`. 每個建構函式、 方法和屬性存取子包含呼叫方法。Each constructor, method, and property accessor includes a call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/cs/GetCurentMethod1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/vb/GetCurentMethod1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回陣列中的項目會以其出現在清單中的泛型方法的型別參數的順序。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果目前的方法是封閉式的建構的方法 (亦即屬性會傳回`false`)，所傳回的陣列方法包含已指派給泛型方法的泛型類型參數的型別定義。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果目前的方法是泛型方法定義，陣列會包含型別參數。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果目前的方法是開啟的建構的方法 (亦即屬性會傳回`true`) 中某些型別參數和型別已指派特定類型的封入泛型類型參數已指派給其他類型參數，陣列會包含型別和型別參數。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用辨別這兩者的屬性。Use the property to tell them apart. 如需示範此案例中，請參閱針對提供的程式碼範例屬性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example provided for the property. .NET Framework 2.0 不支援泛型建構函式。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 這個屬性會擲回如果未在衍生類別中覆寫，因此例外狀況會擲回目前的執行個體屬於類型。This property throws if not overridden in a derived class, so an exception is thrown if the current instance is of type . 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取參數`Invoke`委派的方法。The following example uses the method to retrieve the parameters of the `Invoke` method of a delegate. 此範例會定義名為委派`MyDelegate`和名為事件`ev`型別的`MyDelegate`。The example defines a delegate named `MyDelegate` and an event named `ev` of type `MyDelegate`. 中的程式碼`Main`方法會藉由取得事件的委派類型，來探索事件簽章取得`Invoke`的委派類型，然後擷取並顯示參數的方法。The code in the `Main` method discovers the event signature by getting the delegate type of the event, getting the `Invoke` method of the delegate type, and then retrieving and displaying the parameters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是很便利的方法呼叫方法多載，傳遞for`invokeAttr`並`null`的`binder`和`culture`。This is a convenience method that calls the method overload, passing for `invokeAttr` and `null` for `binder` and `culture`. 如果叫用的方法會擲回的例外狀況，方法傳回的例外狀況。If the invoked method throws an exception, the method returns the exception. 要叫用靜態方法，使用其物件，傳遞`null`如`obj`。To invoke a static method using its object, pass `null` for `obj`. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個方法多載來叫用的執行個體建構函式，該物件會提供給`obj`重新初始化; 也就是執行所有執行個體的初始設定式。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果類別建構函式會叫用，將重新初始化該類別;也就是所有類別初始設定式會都執行。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. 如果目前方法的參數是實值類型，並在對應的引數`parameters`是`null`，執行階段會傳遞實值類型的零初始化執行個體。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用反映的動態方法查閱。The following code example demonstrates dynamic method lookup using reflection. 請注意，您無法使用叫用在衍生類別中覆寫的方法，因為晚期繫結無法解析覆寫基底類別的物件。Note that you cannot use the object from the base class to invoke the overridden method in the derived class, because late binding cannot resolve overrides. remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態叫用的方法，這個執行個體所反映在`obj`，並傳遞指定的參數。Dynamically invokes the method reflected by this instance on `obj`, and passes along the specified parameters. 如果方法是靜態的`obj`參數會被忽略。If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 對於非靜態方法，`obj`應繼承或宣告方法，而且必須是相同的型別為這個類別的類別的執行個體。For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class. 如果方法沒有任何參數，值`parameters`應該是`null`。If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否則，數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`應該相同數目、 類型和這個執行個體所反映之方法的參數順序。Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in `parameters` should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance. 您不可以省略選擇性參數呼叫`Invoke`。You may not omit optional parameters in calls to `Invoke`. 若要叫用方法，並省略選擇性參數，您應該呼叫`Type.InvokeMember`改。To invoke a method omitting optional parameters, you should call `Type.InvokeMember` instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個方法多載來叫用的執行個體建構函式，該物件會提供給`obj`重新初始化; 也就是執行所有執行個體的初始設定式。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果類別建構函式會叫用，將重新初始化該類別;也就是所有類別初始設定式會都執行。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 傳值方式傳遞基本參數，執行一般擴展 (Int16]-> [Int32，比方說)。For pass-by-value primitive parameters, normal widening is performed (Int16 -> Int32, for example). 傳值方式傳遞參考參數，一般參考擴展允許 （至基底類別和介面類型的基底類別衍生的類別）。For pass-by-value reference parameters, normal reference widening is allowed (derived class to base class, and base class to interface type). 不過，藉由參照傳遞基本參數，類型必須完全相符。However, for pass-by-reference primitive parameters, the types must match exactly. 藉由參照傳遞的參考參數，一般的擴展仍然適用。For pass-by-reference reference parameters, the normal widening still applies. 比方說，如果此方法所反映此執行個體宣告為`public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`，然後`parameters`應該是陣列`Objects`長度為 2， `parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`。For example, if the method reflected by this instance is declared as `public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`, then `parameters` should be an array of `Objects` with length 2 such that `parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`. 如果目前方法的參數是實值類型，並在對應的引數`parameters`是`null`，執行階段會傳遞實值類型的零初始化執行個體。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. 反映在叫用虛擬方法時，會使用動態方法的查閱。Reflection uses dynamic method lookup when invoking virtual methods. 例如，假設 B 類別繼承自類別 A，並同時實作一個名為 M 的虛擬方法。現在，假設您有`MethodInfo`物件，代表 M 類別 a。如果您使用`Invoke`M 型別 B 的物件上叫用，則反映將使用實作類別 b 所指定的方法即使 B 類型的物件轉換成的使用類別 B 所指定的實作 （請參閱以下的程式碼範例）。For example, suppose that class B inherits from class A and both implement a virtual method named M. Now suppose that you have a `MethodInfo` object that represents M on class A. If you use the `Invoke` method to invoke M on an object of type B, then reflection will use the implementation given by class B. Even if the object of type B is cast to A, the implementation given by class B is used (see code sample below). 相反地，如果此方法為非虛擬的則反映將使用從中指定類型的實作`MethodInfo`已取得的無論何種傳遞做為目標的物件類型。On the other hand, if the method is non-virtual, then reflection will use the implementation given by the type from which the `MethodInfo` was obtained, regardless of the type of the object passed as the target. 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取和完全信任程式碼時，透過反映叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked via reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 如果叫用的方法會擲回的例外狀況，`TargetInvocationException.GetException`傳回的例外狀況。If the invoked method throws an exception, `TargetInvocationException.GetException` returns the exception. 此實作會擲回`NotSupportedException`。This implementation throws a `NotSupportedException`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例示範的所有成員類別使用的多載。The following example demonstrates all members of the class using an overload of . 私用方法`CanConvertFrom`尋找指定的型別相容的類型。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. 叫用成員的自訂繫結案例中的另一個範例，請參閱[動態載入和使用類型](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md)。For another example of invoking members in a custom binding scenario, see [Dynamically Loading and Using Types](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md). [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象成員宣告基底類別上，因此不提供實作。An abstract member is declared on a base class and has no implementation supplied. 若要取得，第一次取得型別。To get the , first get the type. 從類型 取得的方法。From the type, get the method. 從方法取得`MethodBase`。From the method, get the `MethodBase`. 如果`MethodBase`或建構函式是公用以外，它受到保護，而且無法立即存取。If the `MethodBase` or constructor is other than public, it is protected and cannot be readily accessed. 若要存取非公用方法，將遮罩至`NonPublic`在`GetMethod`。To access a non-public method, set the mask to `NonPublic` in `GetMethod`. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷是否將指定的方法是抽象的並顯示結果。The following example determines whether specified the method is abstract and displays the result. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否可覆寫方法，不檢查是否足夠是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that is `true`. 為可覆寫，方法`IsVirtual`必須是`true`並`IsFinal`必須是`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and `IsFinal` must be `false`. 比方說，一種方法可能非虛擬的但它會實作介面方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. Common language runtime 需要實作介面成員的所有方法都必須都標記為`virtual`; 因此，編譯器將方法標記`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 因此會有一種方法會標示為的情況下`virtual`但仍不可覆寫。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要建立確實是否可覆寫方法，使用如下的程式碼：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: `if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal)` 如果`IsVirtual`已`false`或是`IsFinal`是`true`，則無法覆寫此方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示`false`針對`IsFinal`，這可能會導致您認為 MyMethod 是可覆寫。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that MyMethod is overridable. 程式碼會列印`false`即使沒有標示 MyMethod `virtual` ，因此無法覆寫。The code prints `false` even though MyMethod is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 如果目前的 表示泛型方法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current represents a generic method; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件代表泛型方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents a generic method. 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件都代表開放式建構的方法或封閉式的建構的方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents an open constructed method or a closed constructed method. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，不支援泛型這個屬性會傳回`false`如果未在衍生類別中覆寫。Generics are not supported by default; this property returns `false` if not overridden in a derived class. 泛型建構函式不支援在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，因此這個屬性會傳回`false`如果目前的執行個體屬於類型。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0, so this property returns `false` if the current instance is of type . 下表摘要說明泛型方法特定的恆成立的條件。The following table summarizes the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods. 在泛型反映中，例如所用其他詞彙*泛型類型參數*並*泛型型別*，請參閱屬性。For other terms used in generic reflection, such as *generic type parameter* and *generic type*, see the property. |詞彙Term|非變異條件Invariant condition| |---|---| |泛型方法定義generic method definition| 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`.
定義泛型方法。Defines a generic method. 建構的方法由呼叫方法物件，代表泛型方法定義，並指定的型別引數陣列。A constructed method is created by calling the method on a object that represents a generic method definition, and specifying an array of type arguments.
可以只在泛型方法定義上呼叫方法。The method can be called only on generic method definitions.
任何泛型方法定義是泛型方法，但是反過來說就不正確。Any generic method definition is a generic method, but the converse is not true.| |Generic Method - 泛型方法generic method|`IsGenericMethod` 屬性為 `true`。The `IsGenericMethod` property is `true`.
可以是泛型方法定義中，開啟的建構的方法或封閉式的建構的方法。Can be a generic method definition, an open constructed method, or a closed constructed method.| |開放式建構的方法open constructed method| 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`.
您不可能叫用開啟的建構的方法。It is not possible to invoke an open constructed method.| |封閉式的建構的方法closed constructed method| 屬性為 `false`。The property is `false`.
當檢查以遞迴方式，此方法沒有任何未指派的泛型參數。When examined recursively, the method has no unassigned generic parameters. 包含型別沒有泛型型別參數，而沒有型別引數具有泛型型別參數。The containing type has no generic type parameters, and none of the type arguments have generic type parameters.
可以叫用方法。The method can be invoked.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前代表泛型方法定義，然後：If the current represents a generic method definition, then: - 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`. - 每個中所傳回的陣列物件方法：For each object in the array returned by the method: - 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`. - 屬性會傳回目前的執行個體。The property returns the current instance. - 屬性是相同的位置陣列中的物件。The property is the same as the position of the object in the array. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，不支援泛型這個屬性會傳回`false`如果未在衍生類別中覆寫。Generics are not supported by default; this property returns `false` if not overridden in a derived class. 泛型建構函式不支援在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，因此這個屬性會傳回`false`如果目前的執行個體屬於類型。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0, so this property returns `false` if the current instance is of type . 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsHideBySig As Boolean
public: property bool IsHideBySig { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否只有簽章完全一樣的同類成員隱藏於衍生類別中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether only a member of the same kind with exactly the same signature is hidden in the derived class.

value.span: 如果成員是根據簽章而隱藏，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the member is hidden by signature; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中的成員宣告使用 C#`new`修飾詞或 Visual Basic`Shadows`修飾詞，它可以隱藏基底類別中相同名稱的成員。When a member in a derived class is declared with the C# `new` modifier or the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, it can hide a member of the same name in the base class. C# 簽章隱藏基底類別成員。C# hides base class members by signature. 亦即，如果基底類別成員具有多個多載，會隱藏只有一個是具有相同的簽章。That is, if the base class member has multiple overloads, the only one that is hidden is the one that has the identical signature. 相反地，Visual Basic 會隱藏所有基底類別多載。By contrast, Visual Basic hides all the base class overloads. 因此，會傳回`false`上使用 Visual Basic 中宣告的成員`Shadows`修飾詞，和`true`在 C# 中宣告的成員上`new`修飾詞。Thus, returns `false` on a member declared with the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, and `true` on a member declared with the C# `new` modifier. > [!WARNING] > 這個屬性不會判斷方法是否有屬性。This property does not determine whether a method has the attribute. 宣告使用的方法`new`或`Shadows`修飾詞必須屬性，但只使用宣告的方法`new`（亦即，只有 C# 方法） 會有屬性設定為`true`.A method that is declared with either the `new` or the `Shadows` modifier will have the attribute, but only methods declared with `new` (that is, only C# methods) will have the property set to `true`. 若要判斷方法是否有屬性，請使用類似下列的程式碼：`if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)`在 C# 或`If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot`Visual Basic 中。To determine whether a method has the attribute, use code similar to the following: `if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)` in C# or `If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot` in Visual Basic. 不過請注意，，雖然所有的方法宣告`new`或`Shadows`有屬性，並非所有的方法具有屬性會宣告`new`或`Shadows`。Note, however, that although all methods declared with `new` or `Shadows` have the attribute, not all methods that have the attribute are declared with `new` or `Shadows`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含具有多載方法，基底類別和衍生的類別，來隱藏其中一個多載。The following code example contains a base class with an overloaded method, and a derived class that hides one of the overloads. 在 Visual Basic 版本的程式碼範例中，屬性會傳回`false`的衍生類別中的成員。In the Visual Basic version of the code example, the property returns `false` for the member in the derived class. 在 C# 版本的程式碼範例中，屬性會傳回`true`的衍生類別中的成員。In the C# version of the code sample, the property returns `true` for the member in the derived class. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/cpp/hide.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/CS/hide.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/VB/hide.vb#1)]

public: virtual property bool IsSecurityCritical { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前方法或建構函式在目前信任層級上是否為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，因而可以執行重要的作業。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level, and therefore can perform critical operations.

value.span: 如果目前方法或建構函式在目前信任層級上為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，則為 ，如果它是透明，則為 。

span.span: if the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報表的方法或建構函式，在其目前信任層級，common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the method or constructor at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表顯示這些屬性的組合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件和型別和成員的安全性註釋、 檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 部分信任組件，這個屬性的值取決於目前的組件的信任層級。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果組件載入至部分信任的應用程式網域 （例如，為沙箱化應用程式網域），執行階段會略過組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件及其所有類型中視為透明。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 執行階段在該組件會載入至完全信任的應用程式網域 （例如，載入預設應用程式定義域的桌面應用程式） 時，才支付注意部分信任組件的安全性註釋。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 相較之下，信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取中） 會一律載入以完全信任，無論信任層級的應用程式定義域中，因此其目前的信任層級永遠都是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用，以判斷目前的信任層級的組件和應用程式定義域和屬性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 如需有關反映和透明度的詳細資訊，請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 投影片的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsVirtual As Boolean
public: property bool IsVirtual { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值指出方法是否為 。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method is .

value.span: 如果這個方法為 則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if this method is ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虛擬成員可能會參考類別中的執行個體資料，且必須透過類別的執行個體參考。A virtual member may reference instance data in a class and must be referenced through an instance of the class. 若要判斷是否可覆寫方法，不檢查是否足夠`IsVirtual`是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that `IsVirtual` is `true`. 為可覆寫，方法`IsVirtual`必須是`true`並必須是`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and must be `false`. 比方說，一種方法可能非虛擬的但它會實作介面方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. Common language runtime 需要實作介面成員的所有方法都必須都標記為`virtual`; 因此，編譯器將方法標記`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 因此會有一種方法會標示為的情況下`virtual`但仍不可覆寫。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要建立確實是否可覆寫方法，使用如下的程式碼：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: ```csharp if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal) ``` ```vb If MethodInfo.IsVirtual AndAlso Not MethodInfo.IsFinal Then ``` 如果`IsVirtual`已`false`或是`IsFinal`是`true`，則無法覆寫此方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. 您可以判斷是否目前的方法覆寫基底類別中的方法呼叫方法。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下列範例會實作`IsOverride`作法的方法。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會顯示`false`for `IsFinal`，這可能會導致您以為`MyMethod`是可覆寫。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that `MyMethod` is overridable. 程式碼會列印`false`即使`MyMethod`未標示為`virtual`，因此無法覆寫。The code prints `false` even though `MyMethod` is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支援使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodBase.Invoke(unsigned int32 dispIdMember, [in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, unsigned int32 lcid, int16 wFlags, native int pDispParams, native int pVarResult, native int pExcepInfo, native int puArgErr) cil managed

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _MethodBase.Invoke

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodBase.Invoke(System::UInt32 dispIdMember, Guid % riid, System::UInt32 lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_MethodBase::Invoke;
